Haum

Korean: 하음

Hometown:

Dapsimni-dong, Dongdaemun-gu, Seoul

Age:

5'4" (163 cm)
Group (2025-present):
KiiiKiii

Introduction

Haum is a South Korean singer, dancer, and rapper under Starship Entertainment.

She is the visual, main dancer and lead vocalist of the girl group KiiiKiii, with whom she officially debuted on March 24, 2025 with the release of their first mini album "UNCUT GEM".
